alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hand; Hyde; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 12:29PM MDT until July 05 at 1:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Hand County in central South Dakota... Southeastern Hyde County in central South Dakota... Eastern Lyman County in central South Dakota... Buffalo County in central South Dakota... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 128 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Storla to 9 miles southwest of Iona, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Hand, southeastern Hyde, eastern Lyman and Buffalo Counties, including the following locations... Crow Creek Reservation and southeastern Lower Brule Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
